package com.v1;
class Cat{
	private int old;
	static int counter;
	public Cat(int old) {
		this.old=old;
		counter++;
	}
	public void nextYear() {
		old++;
	}
	public void display() {
		System.out.println("I am a "+old+" age cat");
	}
}
public class MainClass {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("This is first java");
		Cat littleCat=new Cat(1);
		littleCat.display();
		littleCat.nextYear();
		littleCat.display();
		Cat cat2=new Cat(2);
		Cat cat3=new Cat(5);
		cat2.display();
		cat3.display();
		System.out.println(Cat.counter);

	}

}
